info.name: Fund Confirmation
info.description: Provides a service that will answer whether the amount necessary for the execution of a payment transaction is available on the payment account of the payer.

item.name: Returns true or false to indicate if funds are available.

body.raw: Contains info on account, amount and payee.

request.description:
Checks if funds are available on the account specified in the request body. The amount is checked against the account balance (considering booked, reserved and pending amounts as well as any credit limit).

A positive response does not automatically mean that a corresponding payment will be accepted as product specific limits, other payments initiations or other factors may affect payment initiation. The fund confirmation service does not reserve any amount on the account. This service may only be invoked as part of a ongoing payment initiation.
To check funds on a corporate account set the PSU-Corporate-ID header. In production this will need to be combined with using a corporate linked client-id.
